entry.title: Task #59 (Open): Share buttons
entry.content:
(low priority)

buttons to allow sharing of current view via
  • email
  • twitter
  • G+
  • FB

also "Watch" button? Feed?

entry.content:

buttons to allow sharing of current view via
  • email

  • FB

entry.title: Task #57 (Open): Include endpoint settings in URLs
entry.content:
(Reto suggestion 2015-09-29)

@danja -
this will be good for sharing/collab.
bit messy for general use though, so maybe add as:
  • user preference
    and/or
  • button "Full URL" or similar

entry.title: Task #56 (Open): Change UI theme
entry.content:
(from Adrian 2015-09-29)

Please use a different default theme, on themeroller I liked this one:

http://jqueryui.com/themeroller/themeroller?ffDefault=Verdana%2CArial%2Csans-serif&fwDefault=normal&fsDefault=1.1em&cornerRadius=4px&bgColorHeader=cccccc&bgTextureHeader=highlight_soft&bgImgOpacityHeader=75&borderColorHeader=aaaaaa&fcHeader=222222&iconColorHeader=222222&bgColorContent=ffffff&bgTextureContent=flat&bgImgOpacityContent=75&borderColorContent=aaaaaa&fcContent=222222&iconColorContent=222222&bgColorDefault=e6e6e6&bgTextureDefault=glass&bgImgOpacityDefault=75&borderColorDefault=d3d3d3&fcDefault=555555&iconColorDefault=888888&bgColorHover=dadada&bgTextureHover=glass&bgImgOpacityHover=75&borderColorHover=999999&fcHover=212121&iconColorHover=454545&bgColorActive=ffffff&bgTextureActive=glass&bgImgOpacityActive=65&borderColorActive=aaaaaa&fcActive=212121&iconColorActive=454545&bgColorHighlight=fbf9ee&bgTextureHighlight=glass&bgImgOpacityHighlight=55&borderColorHighlight=fcefa1&fcHighlight=363636&iconColorHighlight=2e83ff&bgColorError=fef1ec&bgTextureError=glass&bgImgOpacityError=9

entry.title: Task #55 (Open): Multiple domain/range
entry.content:
we replace rdfs:domain and rdfs:label [?range?] gets replaced by
http://schema.org/domainIncludes http://schema.org/rangeIncludes. We can
have more than one of those (+ button required)

(from Adrian, 2015-09-29)

- try Union approach too - @danja

entry.title: Task #54 (Open): Consistent UI for created classes/properties
entry.content:
the predicate-object listing of existing classes/properties is
replaced by showing it in the same dialog where I create them in the
first place. The "add" button becomes an "update" button in this situation

(from Adrian, 2015-09-29)

entry.title: Task #53 (Open): Prepared language fields
entry.content:
for selected user-configured languages and all languages available in
the ontology I get prepopulated entry fields for label/comments

(from Adrian, 2015-09-29)

entry.title: Task #52 (Open): Language config
entry.content:
languages can be configured per user (browser) and are stored in
browser, when loading an ontology the languages used in this ontology
are added

(from Adrian, 2015-09-29)

entry.title: Task #50 (Open): Add support for OWL ontology terms
entry.content: It will be desirable to support terms such as owl:Class etc. This can be implemented simply through a little dialog triggered by a button associated with eacxh relevant input field.

entry.title: Task #49 (Open): Add extra input fields for different languages
entry.content:
As values are added for each field that supports multiple languages, a new, empty input box should be made available.

(Right now it's possible to do this, but only after initial Class/Property creation).

entry.title: Task #47 (Open): Warn User when they attempt to leave a page with unsaved changes
Task #46 (Open): History (revert)
entry.content: After each modification, the action taken should be recorded and displayed. It should be straightforward to do this in a way that a corresponding revert operation should be available. The best way of doing this remains to be seen : per-operation or simple versioning.

entry.title: Task #43 (Open): Delete or modify classes and properties
entry.content:
It will be desirable to thoroughly delete classes and properties (and their associated children) from with the app.

Some simple modifications will be desirable too - e.g. renaming of a class. This can currently be achieved by adding the new versions and then deleting the old ones, but it's a bit tedious.

entry.title: Task #41 (Open): Create prefix map
entry.content: It would help with adding relationships with well-known vocabs to maintain a list of namespace:preferred prefix mappings.
